alternative.name: Burrito de Claras con Verduras

recipe.title: Egg White Veggie Burrito
steps: Heat olive oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat
Saut√© onions and bell peppers for 2-3 minutes until softened
Add egg whites and scramble until fully cooked
Add spinach and cook until just wilted
Warm tortilla for 10 seconds per side
Fill tortilla with egg mixture, top with salsa
Fold sides in and roll tightly to serve
